ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( Not(ISPICKVAL($User.Team__c, '')), OR( Project__c = 'Runwal Gardens', Project__c = 'Runwal MyCity' ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_prospect == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Prospects not allowed for Gardens and My City
